con:request.name: Request 1

con:config.script: import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils charset = ('0'..'9').join() length = 9999 id = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["Properties"].setPropertyValue( "p_id", id) log.info(id)

import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils charset = ('a'..'z').join() length = 999 title = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["Properties"].setPropertyValue( "p_title", title) log.info(title)

import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils charset = ('a'..'z').join() length = 9999 title = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["Properties"].setPropertyValue( "p_title", title) log.info(title)
